mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_BOARD (BOARD_NO, TITLE, BOARD_DETAIL, QUANTITY, BOARD_REG_DATE, VIEW_COUNT, image_file) VALUES (SEQ_PRODUCT_BOARD.nextval, #{title:VARCHAR}, #{boardDetail:VARCHAR}, #{quantity:NUMERIC}, sysdate, #{viewCount:NUMERIC}, #{fileName:VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM(SELECT inner_table.*, ROWNUM row_seq FROM (SELECT pb.*,p.price FROM PRODUCT_BOARD pb, (SELECT DISTINCT board_no,price FROM PRODUCT WHERE BOARD_NO IS NOT NULL) p
pb.board_no = p.board_no
AND pb.BOARD_NO LIKE ('%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%')
AND UPPER(pb.TITLE) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%')
AND UPPER(pb.BOARD_DETAIL) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%')
AND QUANTITY > 0
AND QUANTITY < 1
ORDER BY pb.board_reg_date DESC
ORDER BY p.price DESC
ORDER BY p.price ASC
ORDER BY pb.board_reg_date DESC
) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
